title: R3BIRTH Unit Live and Fan Meeting Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Mia, Shioriko! It’s finally the day of R3BIRTH’s live! Let’s get started with some warm-ups!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What!? What time do you think it is!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I could understand if you want to go to bed early to get ready for the live, but this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>But Lanzhu can’t just sit still! The three of us are going to be on a stage, you know!? There’s no such thing as too much preparation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>While I get where you’re coming from, there’s a limit to everything, Lanzhu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Lanzhu, be a good girl and go to sleep.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>What’s with you two....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Shioriko and I both want to be in the perfect shape for today’s live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>And getting a good night’s sleep is also part of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Oh, that’s a good point! Alright, let’s sleep!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
